meanings.sent1: The farrago of toys on the floor made it hard to walk.
meanings.sent2: She created a farrago of colors in her painting.
meanings.sent3: The farrago of mismatched socks in the drawer was a sight to see.
meanings.sent4: His mind was a farrago of thoughts, all jumbled up.
meanings.sent5: The garden was a farrago of flowers, each one different and beautiful.

meanings.sent1: The buffet offered a farrago of dishes from different cuisines.
meanings.sent2: The room was filled with a farrago of furniture styles.
meanings.sent3: The farrago of sounds coming from the kitchen indicated dinner was almost ready.
meanings.sent4: Her closet was a farrago of clothes, ranging from formal to casual.
meanings.sent5: The market was a farrago of smells, from spices to fresh produce.
